text:
Yeah, you're right... Hmm... Yeah, I'll be fine!
Hehe, don't worry! ...Okay, see you later.

Meguru, welcome back.
Was the phone call okay?

Oh, Producer... Yeah! You know, I was asked to be
a substitute player for basketball next time!

Meguru, you're still doing substitute player gigs...!?
With all the lessons and work you have...

Lately, you've been helping Mano with her practice too, right?
I'm worried you might overexert yourself and get sick.

...Sorry, Producer...
I've been thinking I need to make choices too.

But I can't choose between idol work
and my friends. That's why...

Right...
Both are important to Meguru.

All right, got it.
Let's have a strategy meeting!

We need to rearrange the schedule
so Meguru can give her all to both.

I'll work even harder to repay you for that...!
To meet your expectations...!
